name: DENTAL_FINDING_NOADD
description: This table contains the items for dental finding records.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record

columns.name: DEN_TOO_FIND_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the type of finding, such as caries, fracture, etc.

columns.name: FINDING_STAT_NOAD_C_NAME
columns.description: The current status the finding's status (unaddressed, resolved, removed, etc.) of the dental finding

columns.name: DENTAL_CARIES_CLS_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the caries classification of a caries finding

columns.name: DENTAL_CARIES_DEPTH
columns.description: Stores the caries depth of a caries finding

columns.name: DENTAL_MOBI_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores information about the severity of mobility documented on a tooth.

columns.name: DENTAL_FURC_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores information about the severity of furcation documented on a tooth.

columns.name: DENT_CARIES_INCIP_C_NAME
columns.description: This columns specifies the incipiency of a caries finding.

columns.name: DENT_FND_OVR_NAME
columns.description: This item specifies the display name that will be used when users document a finding. If populated, this will be used in place of the finding type (I RES 17407) to describe the finding.
